name: 25th Annual IBA Transnational Crime Conference 3 May - 5 May 2023, Boston
content: Topics will include: Rule of Law: Corruption in the judiciary/politics Sanctions: Trends in global sanctions enforcement Attorney-client priviledge and professional enablers Privatisation of law enforcement: are companies becoming the new prosecutors? Bulding and managing your practice: Running a successful (financial) crime practice - some do's and dont's National security: Treason and espionage Date and Time: On Wed, May 3, 2023 ( 7:00 PM) - Fri, May 5, 2023 ( 5:00 PM) Venue details: The Westin Boston Seaport District, 425 Summer Street, Boston, Massachusetts, 02210, United States Prices: IBA Member Before 24 March: USD 1120.00, IBA Non Member Before 24 March: USD 1290.00, IBA Member after 24 March: USD 1235.00, IBA Member after 24 March: USD 1400.00
